channel.title: Tze How
channel.description: Long-form essays on reliability, systems, and software practice.

item.title: Designing for Partial Failure
item.description: A practical approach to graceful degradation when one dependency is unhealthy.

item.title: Why Most Metrics Dashboards Fail
item.description: Dashboards fail when they optimize for visual density instead of operational decisions.

item.title: Gems on the Internet
item.description: Documenting some of my finds across the internet, with various overlaps with my interests. Not including many of the more mainstream ones: Slate Star Codex (Now Astral Codex Ten on Substack). The blog of an essayist/psychiatrist, who talks about almost any topic under the sun. I often cite his articles ...

item.title: The Fed and the Coronavirus
item.description: Some analysis of the chaos in the markets over the past two months - watching interplay between asset classes along with relevant snippets from Reddit submissions.

item.title: OpenAI Car Racing Adventures
item.description: An overview of our Imitation Learning approach towards creating a model to play the OpenAI-CarRacingv0 environment.

item.title: Setting up of i3wm [Ricing]
item.description: Setup process for i3wm, shortcuts, useful tools, and the like

item.title: Ethereum Address Analyzer
item.description: What I was up to in the summer of 2018
